title: Sleeping Beauty
short_plot_summary: A princess is cursed to sleep for a hundred years and can only be awakened by true love's kiss.
explanation: A princess, representing Princess Aurora, the main character of the story
Sleeping symbol, indicating the princess's long slumber due to a curse
A rose, symbolizing the iconic roses surrounding the castle as the princess sleeps

A sparkles, representing the magical element present in the story, including fairies and curses
